monitors.name: UltraView 27X
monitors.description: A 27-inch 4K monitor with vibrant color accuracy, perfect for content creators and professionals working with high-resolution media.

monitors.name: PixelPro 32Q
monitors.description: A 32-inch curved QHD monitor that offers an immersive experience for gamers and multitaskers, with a 165Hz refresh rate and ultra-low latency.

monitors.name: ClearVision 24S
monitors.description: A compact 24-inch IPS monitor with Full HD resolution, delivering sharp text and vivid colors for office work and casual use.

monitors.name: VisionMaster 49
monitors.description: A massive 49-inch ultrawide monitor, designed for multitasking and cinematic experiences, featuring a 32:9 aspect ratio and HDR support.

monitors.name: StreamFlex 144
monitors.description: A 144Hz 27-inch gaming monitor with G-Sync technology, providing smooth and tear-free gameplay for competitive gamers.

monitors.name: EcoScreen 21
monitors.description: A 21-inch eco-friendly monitor with energy-efficient LED backlighting and reduced blue light, ideal for prolonged use without strain on the eyes.
